S.FORM: = Kazakhstan = Gaga kska Yacow ka Kazakhstan, 48 00 N, 68 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 2,724,900 sq km(hangan na o Tg9)(knlbanga dxgal o 2,699,700 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 25,200 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 18,360,353 hiyi. Gaga Astana ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 16 idas 12 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Kazakhstan ga wada sugan 77.40% ka dxgal qpahan, 1.20% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 21.40% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Almazbek Atambayev, pnaah hngkawas2011 idas 12 jiyax 1pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Hasako konghoko = Hasako konghoko(Kari Hasako: Қазақстан Республикасы / Qazaqstan Respýblıkаsy； kari Orosiya: Республика Казахстан; kari Ingkoku: Republic of Kazakhstan, plwanan dha Hasako(Kari Hasako: Қазақстан / Qazaqstan; kari Orosiya: Казахстан; kari Ingkoku: Kazakhstan, koka sunca hmqatar co, hmqatar Oco mi Asiaco tkdha co, pusu na u wa mniq tukcka tudaya Asia, mniq tuiril yayung Uraar ttipiq dxral dha u wa mniq Oco. Kana knrbangan dxral koka Hasako pa 2,727,300 pinghwang kongri, knbeyki bay neyru koka kana jeynseykay, tumngari knbeyhing koka kana jeynseykay. Dmudul keyjay quri tukcka Asia ka Hasako, pdkanan kana tukcka Asia cyuyu knkana sngcan congcu niya u 60%, quri so gasoring, kuki ida nkiya kongyey ka pusu balay, niqan knttuku bay ka kwangcan cuyeyn. Hasako pa quri so bungka u mniq tkcka Asia Mongku bungkacweyn knbeyhing koka. Seyhu Hasako u pskngalan dha mincu, susu, pnwaya pskingal syeyncng konghoko ka Hasoho, kiya mi niqan ou kluwanan bungka ican. Tudaya, tuiril Hasako u msqapah dkoka Orosiya, tunarac hunac u msqapah Cyokoku, turahuc u msqapah Ucupyeyko, Ciarcusu mi Tukuman. Tuiril daya u lmutuc Rihay, Rihay u niqan 2,964 kongri ka hayanseyng. Hnyuwan Hasako pa kiya ka knkana brnux, mdngu brnux sspriq, tudaya wasaw qumi qqhuni, kkuayu, dwiyaq, sancyawco, llmiqu mi mbbuyu, ndanan smpu knhbrawan hiyi Hasako kngkawas 2014 cida u niqan 1,800 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, binaw knbeyhing bay ka dxral koka Hasako, koka kntikuh bay mitu sediq, kingal pinghwang kongri u 6 balay hiyi sediq mniq. Sotu u Nuar-Sutan; ini knpriyux hangan brah cida han u Asutana ka hangan smudan han. Mniq kngkawas 1997 brah cida han u dmuwi knbeyhing bay alang mkbrnux Aramutu ka Sotu han. Rikisi knbeyhing bay dxral Hasako pa kiya ka tlanan kana yomu minjoku, Cngcisuhan u 13 seyki ka mnangal dxral niyi, wada nMongku tiko daw knpriyux da, muda mtdiyan ka kcka tiko nanaq da mi, hiti daw wada miyah bawa tnualang yomu minjoku ka biyax dungal. 16 seyki cida, wada pkrana ka Hasako, wada mubeyki, kcka, tiping tturu yucu. 18 seyki daw prading miyah Hasako brnux sspriq ka sediq Orosiya, dhuq 19 seyki kcka cida, wada nOrosu tiko ka pnhangan dha Hasako. Mnuda Okwo koming ka kngkawas 1917, thiti daw mnuda mccbu ka kcka nanaq Orosiya, tndxral Hasako u mnuda mnou knpriyux, Hasako Suweyay sohuy cuyi konghoko u pnhiyu kngkawas 1936, wada mnSuryeyn ka dxral dha. Kngkawas 1932, mnuda mqraqil beyhing bay uka uuqun, nniqan dha hiya u 150 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka wada mrdang. Wada mkrhak kngkawas 1991 cida pa, Hasako ka thiti bay muda pusa kari dukuricu ka Hasako ida ntumal Suryeyn konghoko. Muwaya bay pnhiyu dha Soto u Nuarsutan Nacaarpayeyhu cida pa hiya nanaq ka lmutuc mangal biyax bukung, dhuq kngkawas 2019 u hiya nanaq ka pusa kari mpsangay. Hasako u mbiyax bay pkrana keyjay dha, quri so suhwa kongyey. Kcka Hasako pa niqan 131 kluwanan minjoku, kiya knkana ka Hasako joku(niqan 65.5% knhbrawan hiyi sediq), sediq Orosiya, sediq Doicu, sediq Tatan mi Weyuarcu. Isurankyo snhiyan u pdkanan 70% knkana knhbrawan dha sediq Hasako, kiya mi Kiristokyo u pdkanan 26%, seyhu Hasako u smruwa ptrawah ana manu snhiyan, binaw hantay seyhu ka bukung dsnhiyan u qrapun dha kiya. Kari Hasako ka ngalan dha srngaw kari seyhu, kari Orosiya u mniq singcng mi cikwan u mtna so snrwanan seyhu ka kari niyi. Babaw dukuricu daw wada mkoka dukuricu kwosyey cngyeyn, kngkawas 2009 prading daw wada mTucyey gikay cngyeynkwo, kngkawas 2001 idas 6 diyax 15 wada mpnsluyan Sanghay hocwo cucu cngyeynkwo. Mniq Tucyey-kcka kari Huyku pa, dungus na "Hasako" u: dukuricu tnpusu, mtrawah qcahur, tura Oco mi Asiya tukubeycu bungka yomu minjoku uri. "Stan", dungus na u "tnsapah", "dxral, sanan mssli", manu so kiya, "Hasakosutan" pa wisu tmiyu nniqan mssli "Hasako joku" . Saya daw "Hasako joku" sunca pa wisu tmiyu knkan mniq kcka Cyokoku, Orosiya, Ucupyeyko, Hasako mi nniqan duma alang Hasako joku. "sediq Hasako sutan"(Kari Hasako: қазақстандық; kari Orosiya: казахстанец) quri so smnlanan suncahaya pa, kiya ka knkana mniq kcka kongmin mniq Hasako. Kngkawas 2014 idas 2 diyax 6, soto Hasako Nuarsutan Nacaarpayeyhu mtqita dayxyo cida, keyngi pryuxun ka kcka hangan koka "Sutan" sbrahun "Yeyryey". So kiya snbrahun daw hangan koka mniq kari Hasako ka mniq kcka Hasako u dungus na pa kiya ka"koka sediq Hasako" . Rikisu Hasako u kndadax Smudan tasil jiday daw tna niqan sediq ka mniq hini. Burah tasil jiday daw prading pkrana qpahun platac tnbuwan, karac tnualang hiya, hnyuwan dxral u mndungus bay kndusan yomu. Qnita dha kawku sweycya pa mniq nniqan knrbangan bay brnux sspriq hiya ka dsediq u wada mndungus bay tpthiyi ka dapa dmay, sediq Suciday ka muwaya bay tnpusu mnniq tukcka Asia. Brah kongyeyn 3 seyki dhuq brah kongyeyn 1 seyki, tukcka Hasako u hana niqan mrahul ka syakay. Peyyah brah dhuq thiti u niqan mrahul ka quri so Usun, Kangcyu, Aran, Weypan, Tawan yomu cngti. T6 seyki dhuq t8 seyki pa pnnhiyu dkoka Tucyey Hanko, Tucisu, Kororu. T8 seyki dhuq tu12 seyki daw, tuiril mi tuiril hunac, tuhunac mi tunarac ka mllutuc tumal dkoka Kosahanko, Ukusuyeyhuko, Cimakohanko mi Cinca ryeynmong. Cinca ryeynmong cida pa wada msranaq Oco, Arapo pantaw, Ayci ka kari Cinca. Nhana t13 seyki cida, babaw pnhyuwan ka Mongku tiko, Cngcisuhan u wada na sbuway risaw na qbsuran Sucu ka nniqan Siporiya mi nniqan tukcka Asia, phiyu Cincanghanko. Nhana tu16 seyki cida, wada mupsnakan Beyhing Yucu, Kcka Yucu, Tiping Yucu turu niyi ka Hanko. Tu17 seyki cida kcka Asia u knsburah mtutuy taxa mbiyax bay yomu koka—Mongku Cwenkoarhanko Mnyahan knrmux Cwenkoarhan ka Hasako, Tiping Yucu u snkaun sutwan dmurun Orosiya smruwa ptmay Orosiya; kngkawas 1735 idas 12 Kcka Yucu u wada tumal Orosiya uri, kiya mi wada yahan mddayak Cwenkoarhanko ka Beyhing Yucu. Binaw kngkawas 1757 cida u wada pkngatun krinah mbiyax bay Cingtiko ka Cwenkoarhanko, kiya mi wada mnCingtiko ka Beyhing Yucu, mniq nhdanan bay taxa Hasakohanko Kohan Kensary wada mrdang kngkawas 1847 daw, balay bay wada pkngatun ka Hasakohanko, Hasako peyyah cida daw prading mtmay Orosiya cumin suuci, dhuq phiyu Arasu cucu konghoko. Tu19 seyki cida wada muda Mccbu Yapyeyn ka Cingtiko mi dmudul mowic ka biyax koka dha, kiya mi miyah mddayak dxral Beyhing Yucu kngkawas 1864 cida ka Orosiya, kndadax cida daw wada mnOrosiya kana ka dxral Hasako. Seyji "Keyngpo Hasako" muda smalu waya Hasako ka "mincu kiya, uxay nsnhiyan mi mpskingal koka"; dmudul puwaya Sotocu koka konghoko, soto ka koka yeynso, kiya ka dmudul koka mquri kcka mi mquri nganguc cngco cipn hwangcn, kiya mi mniq pnluban kwoci rmirih Hasako knbeyhing bay hnyuwan bukung koka, kiya ka ptura sediq mi pskingal koka cngcweyn, so ini khmti lmlu ka keyngpo, ptura mi sndhu biyax kongmin mi mtrawah. Spuda keyngpo mi horicu ka pusu, dmuwi rihwa, suhwa, singcnghwa tuturu biyax pnsnakan mi ppwaluk, ppsdhu, ppsbalay ka muru waya muda ddaun dha. Diyax sqpah soto u 7 kngkawas. Kngkawas 2007 idas 5 diyax 18, Hasako gikay u wada pdaun ka snbarah smalu waya keyngpo, muway biyax Nuarsutan Nacaaryeyhu u malu snpusal muda lmutuc qpahun soto. Soto u malu muda psdhu phiyu congri, hukucongri mi waycyaw, ohwang, keyjay, neycng bucyo mi koka ancyeyn ingkay cusi, kiya mi kasi ka srwaun gikay. Soto u niqan biyax na ini sruwa pndanan hwaan gikay. Waycyaw Pusu tyawmu: Hasako cyeyncyaw ryeypyaw Hasako wa nryeynhoko, Oco ancweyn mi hocwo cucu, Oco-Tasiyang hocwo ingkaymi Isuran hocwo cucu(OIC) cngyeynko, kiya mi Peytasiyang kongyey cucu mi Hoping hwopan pnluban cihwa canyuko. Kngkawas 2010 idas 4 diyax 11 cida, soto Nacaarpayeyhu mi Peyrako Opama mniq kcka Hwasngtun muda hocu anjeyng honghuy, pprngaw pkrana Amirika mi Hasako pnluban canryey hocwo, psdhu kari pkrana swangpyeyn hocwo, kndudul hoanjeyn mi ini krhak mrana, tukcka Asia snbalay, keyjay mrana mi pusucyacu. Kngkawas 2011 idas 4 cida, lmutuc pprngaw honeng anjeyn pprngawan, mray so BN-350 hwaningru na dnuwi jayryaw anjeynsing, kiya mi kmita malu ndanan pnluban kngkawas 2010 ddha dha. Hasako pa dukuricu koka kwosyey uri, keyjay hocwo cucu mi Sanghay hocwo cucu cngyeynko, kiya mi msupu Orosiya, Payorosu, Ciarcisu mi Taciko u mniq kngkawas 2000 cida phiyu OYa keyjay kongtongti, knpriyux pnsliyan txtaxa koka so pntnaun kana ka kwanswey, kiya mi so psblayun ka ddaun jiyu mawyi. Hasako ka muda dmudul kngkawas 2010 Oco anjeyng mi hocwo cucu, Hasako u mniq kngkawas 2012 idas 11 diyax 12 muwaya bay wada uwewan ryeynhoko jncweyn risuhuy cngyeyn. Kndadax 1991 dukuricu cida, Hasako u dmuwi twohwang waycyaw cngco(kari Hasako: ), miying mniqa ddha beyhing koka-Orosiya mi Cyokoku, kiya mi Amirika mi knkaka sihwang sucyey koka smmalu pntna pnluban waycyaw, Orosiya u mniq Hasako tukcka hunac, knbarux ya bay 6,000 pinghwang kongri ddiyun Peykonu hangtyeyn hwasocang, hwasocang niyi pa kiya ka nniqan ppusa sucyey muwaya bay mapa sediq taykong cihwa, Suryeyn taykongso pawhongsweyhaw taykongso mi hopinghaw taykongcan. Cyunsu Biyax cyunsu Hasako u lmutuc Suryeyn biyax ucwang Tuarci sutancyuncyu ka seiyah dha, wada mangal Suryeyn tu40 cyun mi tu17 cyun duma mpcaping. Hasako butay u kiya knkana:rucyun(20,000 hiyi), haycyun(3,000 hiyi), kongcyun(12,000 hiyi) mi kohwangbu(4,000 hiyi), kiya mi niqan ka 31,000 ka cwencyunsu jnyeyn. Nniqan Kana knrbangan dxral Hasako pa 2,724,900 pinghwan kongri, kiya ka knkana jeynseykay knbeyhing bay neyru koka, lipax dxral u tubaraw ka tunarac mi turuma ka tuiril, tuiril ka Turan truma dxral mi Rihay kngahu ucilung turuma dxral, tuiril daya mi tudaya u niqan brnux Orosiya, tuiril brnux Siporiya lntudan brnux. Tukcka ka Hasako cyoring, tunarac mi tunarac hunac ka ddwiyaq, kiya ka Pamiar daya brnux lntudan mquri tudaya. Pusu nniqan Hasako u wa mniq Asia, mniq tuiril ddwiyaq tudu Uraar u na quri tunarac Ocokiya. Pusu beyhing alang mkbrnux u kiya kana ka Nuarsutan, Aramutu, Karakanta, Simuknto, Atoraw mi Osukomn. Pusu bay qqsiya u kiya kana ka langu Paarsu, langu Cisang. Msupu Ucupyeyko psuasu Ucilung mrmun, tuiril u sqapah Rihay(knkana jeynseykay knbeyhing bay langu neyru), knou bay langu qsiya u langu mrmun qsiya. Yayung kcka koka u to bay so yayung qluluy kcka koka nanaq, pusu bay yayung u niqan yayung Oarcisu, yayung Siar, yayung Uraar. Karac Karac Hasako u kiya knkana cyawcitwan karactarusing, kawas pnyahan qsiya quyux u 1000 hawmi, muxul ka rbawan mi knskuy bay ka misan, binaw dwiyaq lmiqu u tnkawas niqan huda uri, knkingal nniqan u ini bay pntna kana ka karac. Nuarsutan ka msnul Uranpato ka jeynseykay tudha knskuy sotu, misan u knskuy bay o hmrinas -40℃, knttu niqan t4, t5 ci beyhing bwihur, sotu cuxan Aramutu u knskuy na bay u dhuq -20℃, uka hari msbwihur. Qmuyux mniq nniqan mndngu, dmka mdngu karac u kndudul mlih, dmka mbbuyu mi mbbuyu ka Hasako pa pdkanan knkana dxral koka 60% ka knrbangan da, mniq nniqan mbbuyu ka qnyuxan qsiya knkawas u ini dhuq 100 hawmi, misan daw kndnguwan balay. Hasako u niqan 10 ka ida nkiya qlhangan cyu mi 10 ka Hasako koka kongyey, muda qmlahang uka hari qtan mi mpkuka ccamac mi ppwalang, qtan bay ppwalang Hasako u hwangsu, tingping pphpahsu, ppixinsu, taycawsu mi ssukaysu, mpkuka ppwalang u kiya ka mnhru nanaq ringgo(Sincyang lmiqu ringgo), lmiqu budo(budu qpiyun sinaw), lmiqu yucinsyang(jukoriyucinsyang) mi uka hari qtan yangcong ucong riyeycyo cong, weyarmoto yeynwey mi Tulipa kaufmanniana. Qtan bay pujurey ccamac Hasako pa, kiya kana ka huling rang, tanah rqbux, bnaqi rqbux, to rqnux, pan miric(knbering bay qbubur miric suwucong), OYa sori, osagisun mi huda lklic, wisu qlhangun duma. Bnkuwan patas tanah Hasako bntasan qnlhangan u kiya knkana 125 kluwanan buc tudu ccamac, kiya uri ka ou kluwanan qduda mi pujurey ccamac, kiya mi 404 kluwanan ppwalang, cncyun, cawrey mi tiyi. Keyjay Hasako ka knkana tukcka Asia knbeyhing bay keyjayti, knmalu bay ka knrana na uri, alaw ka yeynyo cukoryang mi mkala ka neydang gasoring, Hasako u kngkawas 2013 brah cida ida pndkanan 8% ka keyjay cngcangryu, binaw kngkawas 2014 mi kngkawas 2015daw snturung thtur mnara ka keyjay dha, Hasako ka tukingal mnhdu muway saking hbangan koci sbuway brah Suryeyn konghoko, wada knama 7 kngkawas mnhdu muway saking. Keyjay Hasako u gasoring, gasu, kmari kwang, bawah mey mi qpahun tnbuwan ka pusu nngalan hbangan, cyakongyey mi cingkongyey u mthiti hari kiya. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Seyhu Hasako u kngkawas 2020 idas 5 knhbrawan hiyi sediq u ya bay 18,776,707 hiyi, kcka niya u pndkanan 46％ hiyi ka wa mniq alng mpqpah mhuma ppwalang, pdkanan 54％ ka wa mniq alang beyhing mkbrnux. Kari Keypo Hasako u pnwaya kari Hasako ka kari koka, mntna kari Orosiya ka kari dduwiseyhu. Peyyah wada mkrhak ka Suryeyn daw, Hasako u dmuwi kari Hasako ka patas ddiyun seyhu uri da, binaw knhbrawan sediq u wana dmuwi kari Hasako yuyiwen muda pttuku sduwi dha mndungus bay ppatas, binaw balay bay muda seyri ddaun u ida dmuwi kari Orosiya. Kngkawas 2011, Wenhwabu Hasako pusa kingal ang, smatang knpriyux kari koka cngco, dmudul pnluban kana sediq Hasako mi seyhu, kiya kana patas dduwi koka u dmuwi kari Hasako kana. Kari Hasako u tmn kingal kari Tucyey, Hasako u ya bay niqan pdkanan 66.4% ka sediq pa dmuwi tnpusu bay kari Hasako nanaq. Seyhu Hasako mniq kngkawas 2015 idas 1 pusa kari mniq kngkawas 2025 brah cida, bnkuwan ppatas kari Hasako pa kndadax jiyi Siriar sbrahun knpriyux jiyi Rating. Hasako u niqan ka dmuwi ini khbaraw sediq dmuwi kari, kiya ka kari Ucupyeyko, kari Ukoran, kari Weyuar, kari Koarkocu mi kari Tatan, kari Eygo mi kari Tuarci u kndadax mkrhak ka Suryeyn daw, quri so rrisaw ka kndudul dmuwi. Hasako kyoiku tisi dmuwi kari Hasako mi kari Orosiya mi knhaun dmuwi ka kari Hasako mi Orosiya. Mniq kngkawas 2019 kcka kari mpsangay ka Nacaarpayeyhu cida, rmngaw ka hiya nxan ka sediq Hasako pa "mpkla rngaw turu kluwanan kari(kari Hasako, kari Orosiya, kari Eygo)" kiya ka sediq mtrawah balay. Bungka Mniq qnlhangan Orosiya brah cida pa, yomu ka pusu balay ddaun keyjay Hasako, kiya mi mrana bay ka kndkilan bungka. Isurankyo u sediq Arapo ka mnadas dha miyah nniqan dha hiya tu8 seyki cida, hana prading han u swarang dha Tuarcisutan, kiya mi mquri tudaya pkrana, Samawangcaw ka mbiyax bay mwarang kari uri, sndhu pkrana snhiyan Isurankyo mniq nniqan dha hiya, Cincahanko u tu14 seyki cida pa kndudul swarang dha nniqan dha knkingal alang. Nniqan bay hhangan sediq Hasako pa kiya knkana Apay Kunanpayeyhu(sediq mbatas uyas), Sapinna Aytipokowa(paycyo undoing), Timasi Kutaipyeyryeykun(hayo mpuyas), Kunnaci Kunnaciyeyweyci Krohuking(bokusing undoing).

= Kazakhstan = Gaga kska Yacow ka Kazakhstan, 48 00 N, 68 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 2,724,900 sq km(hangan na o Tg9)(knlbanga dxgal o 2,699,700 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 25,200 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 18,360,353 hiyi. Gaga Astana ka poso alang paro, jiyax 16 idas 12 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Kazakhstan ga wada sogan 77.40% ka dxgal qpahan, 1.20% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 21.40% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Almazbek Atambayev, pnaah hngkawas2011 idas 12 jiyax 1pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Hasako konghoko = Hasako konghoko(Kari Hasako: Қазақстан Республикасы / Qazaqstan Respýblıkаsy； kari Orosiya: Республика Казахстан; kari Ingkoko: Repoblic of Kazakhstan, plwanan dha Hasako(Kari Hasako: Қазақстан / Qazaqstan; kari Orosiya: Казахстан; kari Ingkoko: Kazakhstan, koka sonca hmqatar co, hmqatar Oco mi Asiaco tkdha co, poso na o wa mniq tokcka todaya Asia, mniq toiril yayong Uraar ttipiq dxral dha o wa mniq Oco. Kana knrbangan dxral koka Hasako pa 2,727,300 pinghwang kongri, knbeyki bay neyro koka kana jeynseykay, tomngari knbeyhing koka kana jeynseykay. Dmodol keyjay qori tokcka Asia ka Hasako, pdkanan kana tokcka Asia cyoyo knkana sngcan congco niya o 60%, qori so gasoring, koki ida nkiya kongyey ka poso balay, niqan knttoko bay ka kwangcan coyeyn. Hasako pa qori so bongka o mniq tkcka Asia Mongko bongkacweyn knbeyhing koka. Seyho Hasako o pskngalan dha minco, soso, pnwaya pskingal syeyncng konghoko ka Hasoho, kiya mi niqan oo klowanan bongka ican. Todaya, toiril Hasako o msqapah dkoka Orosiya, tonarac honac o msqapah Cyokoko, torahoc o msqapah Ucopyeyko, Ciarcoso mi Tokoman. Toiril daya o lmotoc Rihay, Rihay o niqan 2,964 kongri ka hayanseyng. Hnyowan Hasako pa kiya ka knkana brnox, mdngo brnox sspriq, todaya wasaw qomi qqhoni, kkoayo, dwiyaq, sancyawco, llmiqo mi mbboyo, ndanan smpo knhbrawan hiyi Hasako kngkawas 2014 cida o niqan 1,800 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, binaw knbeyhing bay ka dxral koka Hasako, koka kntikoh bay mito sediq, kingal pinghwang kongri o 6 balay hiyi sediq mniq. Soto o Noar-Sotan; ini knpriyox hangan brah cida han o Asotana ka hangan smodan han. Mniq kngkawas 1997 brah cida han o dmowi knbeyhing bay alang mkbrnox Aramoto ka Soto han. Rikisi knbeyhing bay dxral Hasako pa kiya ka tlanan kana yomo minjoko, Cngcisohan o 13 seyki ka mnangal dxral niyi, wada nMongko tiko daw knpriyox da, moda mtdiyan ka kcka tiko nanaq da mi, hiti daw wada miyah bawa tnoalang yomo minjoko ka biyax dongal. 16 seyki cida, wada pkrana ka Hasako, wada mobeyki, kcka, tiping ttoro yoco. 18 seyki daw prading miyah Hasako brnox sspriq ka sediq Orosiya, dhoq 19 seyki kcka cida, wada nOroso tiko ka pnhangan dha Hasako. Mnoda Okwo koming ka kngkawas 1917, thiti daw mnoda mccbo ka kcka nanaq Orosiya, tndxral Hasako o mnoda mnoo knpriyox, Hasako Soweyay sohoy coyi konghoko o pnhiyo kngkawas 1936, wada mnSoryeyn ka dxral dha. Kngkawas 1932, mnoda mqraqil beyhing bay oka ooqon, nniqan dha hiya o 150 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka wada mrdang. Wada mkrhak kngkawas 1991 cida pa, Hasako ka thiti bay moda posa kari dokorico ka Hasako ida ntomal Soryeyn konghoko. Mowaya bay pnhiyo dha Soto o Noarsotan Nacaarpayeyho cida pa hiya nanaq ka lmotoc mangal biyax bokong, dhoq kngkawas 2019 o hiya nanaq ka posa kari mpsangay. Hasako o mbiyax bay pkrana keyjay dha, qori so sohwa kongyey. Kcka Hasako pa niqan 131 klowanan minjoko, kiya knkana ka Hasako joko(niqan 65.5% knhbrawan hiyi sediq), sediq Orosiya, sediq Doico, sediq Tatan mi Weyoarco. Isorankyo snhiyan o pdkanan 70% knkana knhbrawan dha sediq Hasako, kiya mi Kiristokyo o pdkanan 26%, seyho Hasako o smrowa ptrawah ana mano snhiyan, binaw hantay seyho ka bokong dsnhiyan o qrapon dha kiya. Kari Hasako ka ngalan dha srngaw kari seyho, kari Orosiya o mniq singcng mi cikwan o mtna so snrwanan seyho ka kari niyi. Babaw dokorico daw wada mkoka dokorico kwosyey cngyeyn, kngkawas 2009 prading daw wada mTocyey gikay cngyeynkwo, kngkawas 2001 idas 6 diyax 15 wada mpnsloyan Sanghay hocwo coco cngyeynkwo. Mniq Tocyey-kcka kari Hoyko pa, dongos na "Hasako" o: dokorico tnposo, mtrawah qcahor, tora Oco mi Asiya tokobeyco bongka yomo minjoko ori. "Stan", dongos na o "tnsapah", "dxral, sanan mssli", mano so kiya, "Hasakosotan" pa wiso tmiyo nniqan mssli "Hasako joko" . Saya daw "Hasako joko" sonca pa wiso tmiyo knkan mniq kcka Cyokoko, Orosiya, Ucopyeyko, Hasako mi nniqan doma alang Hasako joko. "sediq Hasako sotan"(Kari Hasako: қазақстандық; kari Orosiya: казахстанец) qori so smnlanan soncahaya pa, kiya ka knkana mniq kcka kongmin mniq Hasako. Kngkawas 2014 idas 2 diyax 6, soto Hasako Noarsotan Nacaarpayeyho mtqita dayxyo cida, keyngi pryoxon ka kcka hangan koka "Sotan" sbrahon "Yeyryey". So kiya snbrahon daw hangan koka mniq kari Hasako ka mniq kcka Hasako o dongos na pa kiya ka"koka sediq Hasako" . Rikiso Hasako o kndadax Smodan tasil jiday daw tna niqan sediq ka mniq hini. Borah tasil jiday daw prading pkrana qpahon platac tnbowan, karac tnoalang hiya, hnyowan dxral o mndongos bay kndosan yomo. Qnita dha kawko sweycya pa mniq nniqan knrbangan bay brnox sspriq hiya ka dsediq o wada mndongos bay tpthiyi ka dapa dmay, sediq Sociday ka mowaya bay tnposo mnniq tokcka Asia. Brah kongyeyn 3 seyki dhoq brah kongyeyn 1 seyki, tokcka Hasako o hana niqan mrahol ka syakay. Peyyah brah dhoq thiti o niqan mrahol ka qori so Uson, Kangcyo, Aran, Weypan, Tawan yomo cngti. T6 seyki dhoq t8 seyki pa pnnhiyo dkoka Tocyey Hanko, Tociso, Kororo. T8 seyki dhoq to12 seyki daw, toiril mi toiril honac, tohonac mi tonarac ka mllotoc tomal dkoka Kosahanko, Ukosoyeyhoko, Cimakohanko mi Cinca ryeynmong. Cinca ryeynmong cida pa wada msranaq Oco, Arapo pantaw, Ayci ka kari Cinca. Nhana t13 seyki cida, babaw pnhyowan ka Mongko tiko, Cngcisohan o wada na sboway risaw na qbsoran Soco ka nniqan Siporiya mi nniqan tokcka Asia, phiyo Cincanghanko. Nhana to16 seyki cida, wada mopsnakan Beyhing Yoco, Kcka Yoco, Tiping Yoco toro niyi ka Hanko. To17 seyki cida kcka Asia o knsborah mtotoy taxa mbiyax bay yomo koka—Mongko Cwenkoarhanko Mnyahan knrmox Cwenkoarhan ka Hasako, Tiping Yoco o snkaon sotwan dmoron Orosiya smrowa ptmay Orosiya; kngkawas 1735 idas 12 Kcka Yoco o wada tomal Orosiya ori, kiya mi wada yahan mddayak Cwenkoarhanko ka Beyhing Yoco. Binaw kngkawas 1757 cida o wada pkngaton krinah mbiyax bay Cingtiko ka Cwenkoarhanko, kiya mi wada mnCingtiko ka Beyhing Yoco, mniq nhdanan bay taxa Hasakohanko Kohan Kensary wada mrdang kngkawas 1847 daw, balay bay wada pkngaton ka Hasakohanko, Hasako peyyah cida daw prading mtmay Orosiya comin sooci, dhoq phiyo Araso coco konghoko. To19 seyki cida wada moda Mccbo Yapyeyn ka Cingtiko mi dmodol mowic ka biyax koka dha, kiya mi miyah mddayak dxral Beyhing Yoco kngkawas 1864 cida ka Orosiya, kndadax cida daw wada mnOrosiya kana ka dxral Hasako. Seyji "Keyngpo Hasako" moda smalo waya Hasako ka "minco kiya, oxay nsnhiyan mi mpskingal koka"; dmodol powaya Sotoco koka konghoko, soto ka koka yeynso, kiya ka dmodol koka mqori kcka mi mqori ngangoc cngco cipn hwangcn, kiya mi mniq pnloban kwoci rmirih Hasako knbeyhing bay hnyowan bokong koka, kiya ka ptora sediq mi pskingal koka cngcweyn, so ini khmti lmlo ka keyngpo, ptora mi sndho biyax kongmin mi mtrawah. Spoda keyngpo mi horico ka poso, dmowi rihwa, sohwa, singcnghwa totoro biyax pnsnakan mi ppwalok, ppsdho, ppsbalay ka moro waya moda ddaon dha. Diyax sqpah soto o 7 kngkawas. Kngkawas 2007 idas 5 diyax 18, Hasako gikay o wada pdaon ka snbarah smalo waya keyngpo, moway biyax Noarsotan Nacaaryeyho o malo snposal moda lmotoc qpahon soto. Soto o malo moda psdho phiyo congri, hokocongri mi waycyaw, ohwang, keyjay, neycng bocyo mi koka ancyeyn ingkay cosi, kiya mi kasi ka srwaon gikay. Soto o niqan biyax na ini srowa pndanan hwaan gikay. Waycyaw Poso tyawmo: Hasako cyeyncyaw ryeypyaw Hasako wa nryeynhoko, Oco ancweyn mi hocwo coco, Oco-Tasiyang hocwo ingkaymi Isoran hocwo coco(OIC) cngyeynko, kiya mi Peytasiyang kongyey coco mi Hoping hwopan pnloban cihwa canyoko. Kngkawas 2010 idas 4 diyax 11 cida, soto Nacaarpayeyho mi Peyrako Opama mniq kcka Hwasngton moda hoco anjeyng honghoy, pprngaw pkrana Amirika mi Hasako pnloban canryey hocwo, psdho kari pkrana swangpyeyn hocwo, kndodol hoanjeyn mi ini krhak mrana, tokcka Asia snbalay, keyjay mrana mi posocyaco. Kngkawas 2011 idas 4 cida, lmotoc pprngaw honeng anjeyn pprngawan, mray so BN-350 hwaningro na dnowi jayryaw anjeynsing, kiya mi kmita malo ndanan pnloban kngkawas 2010 ddha dha. Hasako pa dokorico koka kwosyey ori, keyjay hocwo coco mi Sanghay hocwo coco cngyeynko, kiya mi msopo Orosiya, Payoroso, Ciarciso mi Taciko o mniq kngkawas 2000 cida phiyo OYa keyjay kongtongti, knpriyox pnsliyan txtaxa koka so pntnaon kana ka kwanswey, kiya mi so psblayon ka ddaon jiyo mawyi. Hasako ka moda dmodol kngkawas 2010 Oco anjeyng mi hocwo coco, Hasako o mniq kngkawas 2012 idas 11 diyax 12 mowaya bay wada owewan ryeynhoko jncweyn risohoy cngyeyn. Kndadax 1991 dokorico cida, Hasako o dmowi twohwang waycyaw cngco(kari Hasako: ), miying mniqa ddha beyhing koka-Orosiya mi Cyokoko, kiya mi Amirika mi knkaka sihwang socyey koka smmalo pntna pnloban waycyaw, Orosiya o mniq Hasako tokcka honac, knbarox ya bay 6,000 pinghwang kongri ddiyon Peykono hangtyeyn hwasocang, hwasocang niyi pa kiya ka nniqan pposa socyey mowaya bay mapa sediq taykong cihwa, Soryeyn taykongso pawhongsweyhaw taykongso mi hopinghaw taykongcan. Cyonso Biyax cyonso Hasako o lmotoc Soryeyn biyax ocwang Toarci sotancyoncyo ka seiyah dha, wada mangal Soryeyn to40 cyon mi to17 cyon doma mpcaping. Hasako botay o kiya knkana:rocyon(20,000 hiyi), haycyon(3,000 hiyi), kongcyon(12,000 hiyi) mi kohwangbo(4,000 hiyi), kiya mi niqan ka 31,000 ka cwencyonso jnyeyn. Nniqan Kana knrbangan dxral Hasako pa 2,724,900 pinghwan kongri, kiya ka knkana jeynseykay knbeyhing bay neyro koka, lipax dxral o tobaraw ka tonarac mi toroma ka toiril, toiril ka Toran troma dxral mi Rihay kngaho ocilong toroma dxral, toiril daya mi todaya o niqan brnox Orosiya, toiril brnox Siporiya lntodan brnox. Tokcka ka Hasako cyoring, tonarac mi tonarac honac ka ddwiyaq, kiya ka Pamiar daya brnox lntodan mqori todaya. Poso nniqan Hasako o wa mniq Asia, mniq toiril ddwiyaq todo Uraar o na qori tonarac Ocokiya. Poso beyhing alang mkbrnox o kiya kana ka Noarsotan, Aramoto, Karakanta, Simoknto, Atoraw mi Osokomn. Poso bay qqsiya o kiya kana ka lango Paarso, lango Cisang. Msopo Ucopyeyko psoaso Ucilong mrmon, toiril o sqapah Rihay(knkana jeynseykay knbeyhing bay lango neyro), knoo bay lango qsiya o lango mrmon qsiya. Yayong kcka koka o to bay so yayong qloloy kcka koka nanaq, poso bay yayong o niqan yayong Oarciso, yayong Siar, yayong Uraar. Karac Karac Hasako o kiya knkana cyawcitwan karactarosing, kawas pnyahan qsiya qoyox o 1000 hawmi, moxol ka rbawan mi knskoy bay ka misan, binaw dwiyaq lmiqo o tnkawas niqan hoda ori, knkingal nniqan o ini bay pntna kana ka karac. Noarsotan ka msnol Uranpato ka jeynseykay todha knskoy soto, misan o knskoy bay o hmrinas -40℃, kntto niqan t4, t5 ci beyhing bwihor, soto coxan Aramoto o knskoy na bay o dhoq -20℃, oka hari msbwihor. Qmoyox mniq nniqan mndngo, dmka mdngo karac o kndodol mlih, dmka mbboyo mi mbboyo ka Hasako pa pdkanan knkana dxral koka 60% ka knrbangan da, mniq nniqan mbboyo ka qnyoxan qsiya knkawas o ini dhoq 100 hawmi, misan daw kndngowan balay. Hasako o niqan 10 ka ida nkiya qlhangan cyo mi 10 ka Hasako koka kongyey, moda qmlahang oka hari qtan mi mpkoka ccamac mi ppwalang, qtan bay ppwalang Hasako o hwangso, tingping pphpahso, ppixinso, taycawso mi ssokayso, mpkoka ppwalang o kiya ka mnhro nanaq ringgo(Sincyang lmiqo ringgo), lmiqo bodo(bodo qpiyon sinaw), lmiqo yocinsyang(jokoriyocinsyang) mi oka hari qtan yangcong ocong riyeycyo cong, weyarmoto yeynwey mi Tolipa kaofmanniana. Qtan bay pojorey ccamac Hasako pa, kiya kana ka holing rang, tanah rqbox, bnaqi rqbox, to rqnox, pan miric(knbering bay qbobor miric sowocong), OYa sori, osagison mi hoda lklic, wiso qlhangon doma. Bnkowan patas tanah Hasako bntasan qnlhangan o kiya knkana 125 klowanan boc todo ccamac, kiya ori ka oo klowanan qdoda mi pojorey ccamac, kiya mi 404 klowanan ppwalang, cncyon, cawrey mi tiyi. Keyjay Hasako ka knkana tokcka Asia knbeyhing bay keyjayti, knmalo bay ka knrana na ori, alaw ka yeynyo cokoryang mi mkala ka neydang gasoring, Hasako o kngkawas 2013 brah cida ida pndkanan 8% ka keyjay cngcangryo, binaw kngkawas 2014 mi kngkawas 2015daw sntorong thtor mnara ka keyjay dha, Hasako ka tokingal mnhdo moway saking hbangan koci sboway brah Soryeyn konghoko, wada knama 7 kngkawas mnhdo moway saking. Keyjay Hasako o gasoring, gaso, kmari kwang, bawah mey mi qpahon tnbowan ka poso nngalan hbangan, cyakongyey mi cingkongyey o mthiti hari kiya. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Seyho Hasako o kngkawas 2020 idas 5 knhbrawan hiyi sediq o ya bay 18,776,707 hiyi, kcka niya o pndkanan 46％ hiyi ka wa mniq alng mpqpah mhoma ppwalang, pdkanan 54％ ka wa mniq alang beyhing mkbrnox. Kari Keypo Hasako o pnwaya kari Hasako ka kari koka, mntna kari Orosiya ka kari ddowiseyho. Peyyah wada mkrhak ka Soryeyn daw, Hasako o dmowi kari Hasako ka patas ddiyon seyho ori da, binaw knhbrawan sediq o wana dmowi kari Hasako yoyiwen moda pttoko sdowi dha mndongos bay ppatas, binaw balay bay moda seyri ddaon o ida dmowi kari Orosiya. Kngkawas 2011, Wenhwabo Hasako posa kingal ang, smatang knpriyox kari koka cngco, dmodol pnloban kana sediq Hasako mi seyho, kiya kana patas ddowi koka o dmowi kari Hasako kana. Kari Hasako o tmn kingal kari Tocyey, Hasako o ya bay niqan pdkanan 66.4% ka sediq pa dmowi tnposo bay kari Hasako nanaq. Seyho Hasako mniq kngkawas 2015 idas 1 posa kari mniq kngkawas 2025 brah cida, bnkowan ppatas kari Hasako pa kndadax jiyi Siriar sbrahon knpriyox jiyi Rating. Hasako o niqan ka dmowi ini khbaraw sediq dmowi kari, kiya ka kari Ucopyeyko, kari Ukoran, kari Weyoar, kari Koarkoco mi kari Tatan, kari Eygo mi kari Toarci o kndadax mkrhak ka Soryeyn daw, qori so rrisaw ka kndodol dmowi. Hasako kyoiko tisi dmowi kari Hasako mi kari Orosiya mi knhaon dmowi ka kari Hasako mi Orosiya. Mniq kngkawas 2019 kcka kari mpsangay ka Nacaarpayeyho cida, rmngaw ka hiya nxan ka sediq Hasako pa "mpkla rngaw toro klowanan kari(kari Hasako, kari Orosiya, kari Eygo)" kiya ka sediq mtrawah balay. Bongka Mniq qnlhangan Orosiya brah cida pa, yomo ka poso balay ddaon keyjay Hasako, kiya mi mrana bay ka kndkilan bongka. Isorankyo o sediq Arapo ka mnadas dha miyah nniqan dha hiya to8 seyki cida, hana prading han o swarang dha Toarcisotan, kiya mi mqori todaya pkrana, Samawangcaw ka mbiyax bay mwarang kari ori, sndho pkrana snhiyan Isorankyo mniq nniqan dha hiya, Cincahanko o to14 seyki cida pa kndodol swarang dha nniqan dha knkingal alang. Nniqan bay hhangan sediq Hasako pa kiya knkana Apay Konanpayeyho(sediq mbatas oyas), Sapinna Aytipokowa(paycyo ondoing), Timasi Kotaipyeyryeykon(hayo mpoyas), Konnaci Konnaciyeyweyci Krohoking(bokosing ondoing).
